OOC: Nothing wrong with this post.  It's a lot better than some of 
the posts I've seen on this PBeM.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Hollywood Narrator" 
<hollywood.narrator@v...> wrote:
> OOC: My pathetic post. Don't mind me, I just wanted to show I'm 
alive.
> 
> BIC:
> 
> Deemos approaches and watches silently, somehow looking both proud 
and upset simultaneously. The reason for this was unknown, but Deemos 
had always been a disturbed robot anyway. Spider walks up and appears 
very excited. Arrow is nowhere in sight.
> 
> Spider: I just hope I can be great enough one day for this team. As 
great as I am, that task may be impossible.
> 
> Deemos: I sacrificed my honor and became a traitor, and there was 
no turning back. I paid my dues through hard work and became a leader 
of a small ill fated faction and I'm still not great. I don't think 
you know what greatness is.
> 
> His sight never strayed from Phoenix while speaking to Spider.
> 
> Spider: Yeah... Yeah.
> 
> The furious Spider tries to pretend Deemos doesn't exist for a 
moment. He tries to hide his resentment of what Deemos said, but is 
unable. He appears really immature, but he was a young bot and very 
arrogant...
>

>   Subject: Re: nWo base
> 
> 
>   Phoenix::
>

forms

is
